Summary: RAPID MOVEMENTS SO FAST I COULD NOT TRACK IT WITH MY HEAD/EYES. MORE VISABLE INFRONT OF TREES AS IT PASSED BY. NO APPARENT FLIGHT PATTERN, MORE LIKE A BUZZING FLY, THERE THEN GONE, NOW THERE ETC....
divs: sighting detailsrapid movements so fast i could not track it with my head\eyes. more visable infront of trees as it passed by. no apparent flight pattern, more like a buzzing fly, there then gone, now there etc.... some circaling. distance 2 ft. to 500feet. i was walking my two dogs and they noticed it as well, barking and making fleeting efforts at chase. very strange experience-first ever. it followed us through the park and to my car, have not seen it since. i first thought someone had a lazer or pinpoint powerfull flashlight moving it from all directions its actions ramped up as i walked almost to get me going in a particular direction. it would circal at the outermost obstacles then seem to pass through and by me like a buzzing fly. at first i was looking for who or what could be making this and then realized it was impossible. became sceptical of my own eyes, but the dogs reminded me i wasn't the only one seeing things. the mood was apprehensive and cautious at first but then my dogs were playing and i was trying to talk to it... so no real fear, other than the unknown. we were done with our walk and left...
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around January 3rd 2010
